name: Interlinked
description: A month-long program exploring material transformation and relational art through exhibitions, talks, and performances in collaboration with UNIMAS and international partners.

name: Songket Weaving Workshop and Crafts Gallery
description: A studio and gallery dedicated to preserving Sarawak’s songket weaving heritage with live demonstrations and handmade textiles.

name: Project Craft Connections: Sarawak Indigenous Craft Anthology
description: A collection showcasing indigenous Sarawak crafts that connect tradition, culture, and sustainability.

name: WAK Food Adventure Trail 2.0
description: A culinary exploration of Kuching’s food scene featuring signature local dishes and hidden gems.

name: WAK Stinky Toe Trail
description: An interactive trail celebrating Kuching’s art, culture, and street heritage.

name: All About Arts
description: A citywide showcase featuring visual artists, creative installations, and art workshops throughout Kuching.

name: Celebrating Malaysia Through the Lens
description: A photography exhibition highlighting Malaysia’s landscapes, people, and stories through artistic perspectives.

name: Wild About Nature – Closer to Nature
description: A nature appreciation series including guided walks, talks, and eco-education activities in Sarawak’s urban green spaces.

name: MATTA Malaysia Pickleball Grand Slam 2025 (MPG2025)
description: A national-level pickleball championship bringing together athletes from across Malaysia for competitive matches.

name: Pink it Up! Market Place
date: 10 Oct - 12 Oct, 17 Oct - 19 Oct, 24 Oct - 26 Oct 2025
organiser: The Spring Management Services Sdn Bhd & WAK Festival
description: A 3-weekend bazaar celebrating Breast Cancer Awareness Month, featuring local artisans, fashion, and wellness brands.

name: Explore, Experience and Energize with LaVie!
organiser: LaVie Wellness Sanctuary by Dr. Lowell Chai
price: RM39 per pax (inclusive of lunch & mini workshops)
description: A 4-week wellness journey exploring nutrition, hormones, breathing, and holistic health to foster mind-body balance.

name: WAK X Texhouse Artspace
description: A collaboration exhibit showcasing textile-based art and cultural designs inspired by Sarawak’s fabric traditions.

name: The Unforgettable 1945: A Forest Timewalk for Peace
description: A guided storytelling walk through nature commemorating the legacy of peace and resilience post-World War II.

name: Engkudu, Akar Penawar Landak and Natural Indigo Dye Workshop
description: A hands-on fabric dyeing workshop using natural plant-based dyes guided by local artisans Ejah Jepon & Injan Lekong.

name: Tapestry: Harmonising Peranakan Cultures
description: An intercultural music workshop exploring the rhythms and melodies of Peranakan traditions through collaborative performance.

name: An Evening with Baba G.T. Lye
description: A special theatre evening with the iconic Baba G.T. Lye sharing stories and performances from decades in Peranakan arts.

name: All About Arts Exhibition
description: A month-long curated exhibition showcasing multidisciplinary artworks from emerging and established Sarawakian artists.
